titles.title: Election Technology Integrity and Fraud Prevention Act
To amend the Help America Vote Act of 2002 to prohibit States from using a voting system which is connected to the Internet in the administration of an election for Federal office.
Election Technology Integrity and Fraud Prevention Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary:
Election Technology Integrity and Fraud Prevention Act
This bill prohibits a voting system used in a federal election from connecting to the internet. Further, it prohibits a voting system from directly tabulating a ballot that was transmitted online.
